feed.title: AO3 - Batfamily Members & Bruce Wayne

entry.title: The Heroes I Raised
entry.summary:
Author: Sweet_Ru07

Summary: when a new magical threat arrives in Gotham, all it's heroes gather to confront it despite their strained relationship with one another. however, despite their best efforts, tragedy strikes. And Bruce Wayne, surrounded by the bodies of his children, is given a chance to try again. with his dying breath he vows, he will do better, no matter what it takes, he will save them this time.This fic is inspired by the webtoon "The S-Classes Raised" but does not require prior knowledge of it, this is my first time writing for these characters and I accept any constructive criticisms. will update the tags as I go

entry.title: WAYNE-KENT CHAOS
entry.summary:
Author: Pamela_Amets

Summary: In some families, the biggest drama is about who will do the dishes.In the Wayne and Kent families, the biggest problem might be the order of marriage.When Batman and Superman secretly start dating,And their sons also secretly start dating,And everyone decides to reveal their relationships at the same time…That’s when CHAOS UNFOLDS.This is the story of how Batman’s detective skills failed to uncover Gotham’s greatest secret,And how even Superman wasn’t prepared for this much drama.Get ready! Because this isn’t just a love story… This is a Wayne-Kent CHAOS!

entry.title: Days of Winters Past
entry.summary:
Author: kitfornow

entry.title: Radioactive Bonds
entry.summary:
Author: Nibgnahc

Summary: Tim Drake faces a dangerous radioactive poisoning, but with the support of his family, Bruce, Dick, Jason, Damian, and Alfred, and the help of the Justice League and mystical forces, they work tirelessly to find a solution. Despite the challenges, they remain united, fighting together with hope and determination. Through their bond and unwavering commitment, they believe that they can overcome the odds and save Tim, strengthening their family even more in the process.

entry.title: Birth of the Bats
entry.summary:
Author: The_duke_is_back

Summary: Crime was rampant in Gotham. It had always been. For as long as they could remember, the city was a smog covered, crime ridden monstrosity. As though a never-ending cloud of gloom and despair sat heavy over the city, bringing the worst of humanity to it.A permanent cover of darkness and despair. A place for criminals to hide.A web long standing.As mad laughter cackled through the city, screams rising from almost every street, a creature long sentenced to darkness,Op e n e di t se y e s

entry.title: Keeping Up with the Waynes
entry.summary:
Author: Gimme_gimme_more

Summary: In a world where Gotham’s most famous family gets their own reality show, the Wayne Family takes you behind the scenes of their crime-fighting lives and daily shenanigans. From sibling rivalries to over-the-top birthday bashes, Bruce’s endless attempts to keep everyone in line, and Alfred’s efforts to keep his sanity, each episode dives into the chaos, humor, and unlikely family bonding moments of Gotham’s most dysfunctional clan. Welcome to Keeping Up with the Waynes—where the Bat-signal isn’t the only drama lighting up the night!~~~Or otherwise known as I saw a tiktok comparing the Wayne's to the Kardashians and decided to write it.
